tool_description: This API returns all the latest news and updates from around the world for the well known Alt-Coin 'Shiba Inu'.
title: Shiba Inu Radar

api_list.name: Get individual Shiba Inu data from various Crypto Sources
api_list.description: This Endpoint returns the data from specific news outlets/websites
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://shiba-inu-radar.p.rapidapi.com/news/{sourceid}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "shiba-inu-radar.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all Shiba Inu News
api_list.description: This Endpoint returns all the Shiba Inu Data
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://shiba-inu-radar.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "shiba-inu-radar.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
